select book_apply.*, book.*, teacher.* from book_apply, book, teacher where book_apply.bid = book.id and book_apply.tid = teacher.id and teacher.id = #{currentTeacherId}
and book.book_id like concat('%', #{bookId}, '%')
and book.book_name like concat('%', #{bookName}, '%')
and book_apply.time like concat('%', date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%')
and book_apply.status like concat('%', #{status}, '%')

select book_apply.*, book.*, teacher.*, department.* from book_apply, book, teacher, department where book_apply.bid = book.id and book_apply.tid = teacher.id and teacher.dept_id = department.id and teacher.dept_id = #{adminDeptId} and book_apply.status <> -1
and book.book_id like concat('%', #{bookApplySearch.bookId}, '%')
and book.book_name like concat('%', #{bookApplySearch.bookName}, '%')
and teacher.tea_id like concat('%', #{bookApplySearch.teaId}, '%')
and teacher.tea_name like concat('%', #{bookApplySearch.teaName}, '%')
and teacher.dept_id like concat('%', #{bookApplySearch.deptId}, '%')
and book_apply.time like concat('%', date_format(#{bookApplySearch.time}, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%')
and book_apply.status like concat('%', #{bookApplySearch.status}, '%')

select book.book_id, book.book_name, book.book_author, book.book_press, book.book_price, book.book_num, sum(book_apply.count) as apply_count, book_apply.status from book, book_apply where book_apply.bid = book.id and book_apply.status = 1
and book.book_id like concat('%', #{bookId}, '%')
and book.book_name like concat('%', #{bookName}, '%')
and book.book_press like concat('%', #{bookPress}, '%')
group by book.book_id having (apply_count - book_num) > 0

select a.date, ifnull(b.nums, 0) as count from ( SELECT curdate() as date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) as date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 day) as date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) as date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 4 day) as date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 day) as date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 6 day) as date ) a left join ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d') as time, COUNT(*) as nums FROM book_apply where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(time) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m-%d') ) b on a.date = b.time order by a.date
